bZx - REKT
11/06/2021

bZx - REKT

Attacks can come from all angles. Straight to number 6 on our leaderboard for bZx, who lost $55M to a phishing attack.

MORE

Cream Finance - REKT 2
10/28/2021

Cream - Yearn - REKT

Cream Finance has been hacked (again) for ~$130 million. The Yearn Finance decentralised monopoly has grown too large. Why accumulate so many protocols if you don’t care for their users?

MORE

Indexed Finance - REKT
10/15/2021

Indexed Finance - REKT

$16 million taken from Indexed Finance. That’s one more protocol added to the rekt register, and $16 million more on our leaderboard. Is anonymity the only way to stay safe?

MORE

FTX - Terms & Commissions
10/06/2021

FTX - SBF

This is a customer service announcement. Will FTX please comply with their own terms and conditions? An unhappy FTX user came to us for help after they were overcharged ~$954,135 by the centralised exchange.

MORE

Compound - REKT
10/04/2021

Compound - REKT

It’s worse than we thought. Last week ~$80M in excess COMP was wrongly distributed. Now another ~$68.8M has been sent to the vulnerable vault, and even more COMP is being given away.

MORE

Overcompensated
09/30/2021

Compound

A Compound governance proposal contained a bug which allowed for the distribution of ~$80M in excess COMP rewards. Mistakes were made, but who lost out?

MORE

Anniversary Auction
09/27/2021

Hello World

To celebrate our one year anniversary, and to fund our future development, we have created 20 unique NFTs. Visit OpenSea now to view the full collection.

MORE

One year of rekt.news
09/23/2021

Hello World

12 months have passed since our Hello World. This is your chance to own a piece of rekt.news. Our anniversary auction sale is now live.

MORE

Vee Finance - REKT
09/21/2021

Vee Finance - REKT

Top ten thievery. $34 million taken from Vee Finance earns them the number 7 spot on our leaderboard, yet nobody seems surprised. What’s normal for us is not normal elsewhere.

MORE

JayPegs Automart - REKT
09/18/2021

NFT - Sushi - JayPeg - REKT

A blue-chip rekt by a front-end attack. Remind us, which part of crypto is supposed to be “trustless”? Misplaced faith (temporarily) cost MISO $3.1 million.

MORE

Spotlight on Solana
09/13/2021

Solana - Spotlight

Was that Solana Summer? These cheaper, faster, centralised chains put the Ethereum "community" to the test. But are their claims accurate?

MORE

DAO Maker - REKT
09/06/2021

DAO Maker - REKT

DAO Maker meet their maker. Again. $4M lost, less than a month after losing $7M. If you get rekt on repeat then we have to say something...

MORE
